wikipedia_page.main: Faith Margaret Ellen Bennett (1903–1969) was a British actress and ATA pilot.

response: *1903 – Faith Bennett, British actress and ATA pilot during WWII (d. 1969)
* May 12 – Faith Bennett, British actress, WWII ATA pilot (d. 1969)
He was twice married.  First, in 1930, to the actress Faith Bennett. They were divorced in 1941, and in 1947 Bennett married Betty Jo Riley, who predeceased him. They had a son, John Charles Bennett.

The Pride of the Force is a 1933 British comedy film directed by Norman Lee and starring Leslie Fuller, Patrick Aherne, Faith Bennett and Hal Gordon.BFI.org The plot concerns a farmworker who inadvertently becomes the pride of the Metropolitan Police force.
| The Pride of the Force || Comedy || Norman Lee || Leslie Fuller, Patrick Aherne, Faith Bennett, Hal Gordon
| Seeing Is Believing || Comedy crime || Redd Davis || William Hartnell, Gus McNaughton, Faith Bennett

Seeing Is Believing is a 1934 British comedy crime film directed by Redd Davis and starring William Hartnell, Gus McNaughton and Faith Bennett. It was made at Elstree Studios as a quota quickie for release by Paramount Pictures.Wood p.79
